Time: Publication-Year, date + date type possible to specify, e.g. collection Date
Person: creators, contributors (type possible to specify, e.g., ProjectLeader or DataCollector)

Location: Spatial Domain, place, Spatial Reference Information (with sub-elements)
Person: Contact Information (with sub-elements), Point of Contact

Quality: Study Protocol Parameter, Assay Measurement Type
Method: Assay Technology Type, Assay Technology Platform
Time: Investigation Submission Date, Investigation Public Release Date, Study Submission Date, Study Public Release Date

Location: Country, Named-Areas, Near-Named-Places, GML, WFS (Web feature service, GIS), WMSURL (Web map service, GIS), SiteCoordinateSets, Altitude, Height, Depth
